title: riot could you just let the community VOTE on which champions that will get skins next?
body: because i feel like if we leave it up to you the same 10 champions {{champion:103}} {{champion:1}} {{champion:245}} {{champion:51}} {{champion:18}} {{champion:11}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:23}} are gonna keep getting skins every other day. i think its time to let the community decide, you'll be surprised on what we actually want.
